CustomField.description: Indication of participation in the household income survey
CustomField.label: Income Opt Out

value.fullName: I certify that our household does not qualify
value.label: I certify that our household does not qualify because our total annual income is above $100,000.
Yes - I will submit my household's information.

value.fullName: I choose not to provide my income information
value.label: I choose not to provide my income information. I understand that this decision may impact the Title I funding available for providing additional programs, benefits, and services for my student(s)'s school.

value.fullName: I choose not to provide my income information and know this may impact the school’s Title I funding
value.label: I choose not to provide my income information and know this may impact the school’s Title I funding
